text: Oreopanax avicenniifolius is a species of plant in the family Araliaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist montane forests and subtropical or tropical high-altitude shrubland. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Flora of Ecuador avicenniifolius Category:Near threatened plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Oreopanax avicenniifolius
